thread.title: Roy Keane backs Manchester United to move for "fantastic" Antoine Griezmann
thread.title_full: Roy Keane backs Manchester United to move for "fantastic" Antoine Griezmann

author: Thomas Bristow
title: Roy Keane backs Manchester United to move for "fantastic" Antoine Griezmann
text:
Roy Keane backs Manchester United to move for "fantastic" Antoine Griezmann The former Red Devils midfielder is shocked by the level the Frenchman is currently playing at Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Roy Keane would love to see Antoine Griezmann at Man United Share this video Get Manchester United FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Roy Keane has revealed he is a big fan of Atletico Madrid's star striker Antoine Griezmann - and believes he would be an incredible player for Manchester United. 
The Irishman was speaking on ITV's Champions League highlights show following Wednesday's round of games. 
The show also featured highlights from Atletico Madrid's match against Bayer Leverkusen on Tuesday. The La Liga outfit won the first leg 4-2, putting them in a strong position for their home tie on March 15. 
Griezmann was again among the scorers and again caught Keane's eye. Griezmann was on target midweek (Photo: Lars Baron/Bongarts/Getty Images) 
"Oh, he's been fantastic," said Keane. "I've been really shocked at the level he's playing at over the last two or three years - he's been fantastic. 
"We're seeing the goals now on a regular basis, in all the big games, on an international level and big Champions League nights. 
"He's been linked with United. What a player he'd be for United." poll loading Will Antoine Griezmann join Manchester United in the summer? 1000+ VOTES SO FAR
